portfolio.title: Lead Product Engineer & Product Manager
portfolio.name: Charles Ponti
portfolio.bio: Data- and results-driven product leader and engineer with 10+ years of translating user needs into high-impact products that drive engagement and revenue. Proven expertise in full-stack development and cross-functional leadership. Committed to building technology that meaningfully and measurably improves human lives.

workExperience.title: Lead Product Manager & Lead Software Engineer
workExperience.subtitle: StreamYard
workExperience.description: Drove end-to-end development of consumer Teams and enterprise Business plans, implementing role-based access control and collaboration features that unlocked $15M+ in new ARR and 13% consumer user growth. Developed a two-sided creator marketplace platform serving 20K+ monthly active users, utilizing vector-based recommendations and generative AI conversation starters, resulting in a 40% increase in user engagement and 300% YoY growth in creator collaborations. Established a data-driven, user-led product development workflow incorporating daily user interviews and in-product surveys, leading to increased user satisfaction and feature adoption rates. Led cross-functional alignment across Design, Research, Customer Service, Marketing, and Trust & Safety teams, implementing quarterly design sprints that improved product vision alignment and sprint velocity.
workExperience.role: Lead Product Manager & Lead Software Engineer

workExperience.title: Product Engineer
workExperience.subtitle: Ponti Studios
workExperience.description: Revrock: Built an end-to-end platform for independent musicians to optimize tours and finances. Key features: intelligent route planning (reducing tour costs), comprehensive financial dashboards, automated venue discovery, and Spotify integration for audience insights. Technologies: Next.js, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, and deployed on Vercel. Prolog: Led engineering of a web application enabling producers to efficiently triage writer submissions, including an LLM-powered email parser for automated data extraction and vector-based similarity search for rapid candidate evaluation. Technologies: Python, Django, React, React Native, OpenAI, AWS. Whistle: Managed product, design, and engineering for a privacy-focused video conferencing platform tailored for movement-based education. Used by a prestigious NYC ballet school to maintain operations during COVID-19. Technologies: React, React Native, Electron, Jitsi.

workExperience.title: Head of Data Engineering
workExperience.subtitle: Kensho
workExperience.description: Led architecture transformation from proprietary ETL platform to a modern data stack (AWS S3, Spark, and Airflow), reducing ETL processing time, increasing scalability, and reducing maintenance issues. Led a high-performing team of 15 engineers across 2 locations, fostering a culture of innovation through the implementation of best practices, comprehensive documentation, and clear roadmap alignment.

workExperience.title: Lead Software Engineer
workExperience.subtitle: Humana
workExperience.description: Led engineering for mobile, voice, and chat applications to enable holistic senior healthcare solutions. Conducted user research interviews to ensure roadmaps maintained high value-driven prioritization.

workExperience.title: Senior Software Engineer
workExperience.subtitle: Mimecast
workExperience.description: Led web application development for an enterprise email and security management product. Developed a scalable and performant white-label styling system and an internationalization/translation library.

workExperience.title: Software Engineer
workExperience.subtitle: Thomson Reuters
workExperience.description: Designed and engineered a web application for global application deployment, management, and monitoring. Enhanced security and regulatory compliance by implementing a fine-grained Role-Based Access Control. Improved high-risk decision-making by developing personalized data dashboards. Elevated cross-team code quality standards by leading monthly technical debt and code review sessions.

workExperience.title: Software Developer
workExperience.subtitle: Glow Digital
workExperience.description: Contributed to the development of a web application for creating and auto-optimizing social ad campaigns. Decreased third-party API requests by 90% without compromising data integrity or accuracy through optimized user-specific data retrieval strategies. Developed an automation system to save users several hours per week of repetitive data entry.

projects.title: Revrock
projects.description: Built an end-to-end platform for independent musicians to optimize tours and finances. Key features: intelligent route planning (reducing tour costs), comprehensive financial dashboards, automated venue discovery, and Spotify integration for audience insights. Technologies: Next.js, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, and deployed on Vercel.

projects.title: Prolog
projects.description: Led engineering of a web application enabling producers to efficiently triage writer submissions, including an LLM-powered email parser for automated data extraction and vector-based similarity search for rapid candidate evaluation. Technologies: Python, Django, React, React Native, OpenAI, AWS.

projects.title: Whistle
projects.description: Managed product, design, and engineering for a privacy-focused video conferencing platform tailored for movement-based education. Used by a prestigious NYC ballet school to maintain operations during COVID-19. Technologies: React, React Native, Electron, Jitsi.
